derivation: apparently from the same as H1326 (בָּתָה) and H410 (אֵל); destroyed of God;
outline:
Bethuel = "God destroys" or "man of God" or "dweller in God"
  1. nephew of Abraham, son of Nahor by Milcah, father of Rebekah
  2. a town of Simeon in the south
strongs_def: Bethuel, the name of a nephew of Abraham, and of a place in Palestine
